Articles.Content: One of my biggest dreams in ksp was having AI that could do mission for me so i could watch like i was in mission control. I wonder in the new game we will have something that will let an ai launch our rockets and do certain missions like going into orbit.

Well, very little news about that. When they get the KSP 2 forums up, ask them!

 

That's probably a late-game, or even end-game mechanic.

There's been a fair amount of discussion back and forth on how complex this would be and how it might be set up in the discussions on signal delay.  (As such an AI/automation is necessary to play with signal delay, and is really the main issue with it.)
There used to be a mod called Probe Control Room which simulated mission control in-game.  Externally there is telemachus.  Tie those to MJ or, especially, KOS and you should have what you wanted.
